text: Is there a tool that identifies all of the latest releases blocked by any dependencies in a Project.toml?

elements.text: Is there a tool that identifies all of the latest releases blocked by any dependencies in a Project.toml?

text: This is not based on a Project.toml, but perhaps that can be added: <https://github.com/KristofferC/RegistryCompatTools.jl|https://github.com/KristofferC/RegistryCompatTools.jl>. And there is this open issue to add to Pkg: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/1655|https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/issues/1655>.
